name: Castles II: Siege and Conquest
description: Castles II: Siege and Conquest is a realtime strategy game developed for the Macintosh, Amiga and MS-DOS by Interplay Productions in 1992, designed and developed by Quicksilver Software; the Macintosh version of the game was published by Interplay's MacPlay brand name. Castles II is the sequel to the 1991 game Castles.
